title: Did President Donald Trump do the agricultural water regulations, causing E. Coley to explode?
subtitle: A viral tweet distorted the nature (and consequences) of a bureaucratic decision taken by the Food and Drug Administration in September 2017.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In the autumn of 2018, there was an outbreak of E. Coly associated with Roman lethargy as a result of a decision by President Trump to reverse existing rules on the inspection of agricultural water.
